byline.original: By BENJAMIN MUELLER and AL BAKER

abstract: James Blake, tennis star who was tackled and mistakenly arrested by plainclothes cop James Frascatore in Midtown Manhattan, meets with New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio and Police Commissioner William J Bratton to discuss police accountability; praises mayor's dedication to department reform during news conference afterwards.
lead_paragraph: The retired tennis star, who was dragged to the ground on Sept. 9, said the mayor was “on the same page as us” on increasing police accountability.

headline.main: James Blake Praises Mayor de Blasio After Meeting on Mistaken Arrest
headline.print_headline: Tennis Star Tackled in Mistaken Arrest Praises Mayor After Meeting

snippet: The retired tennis star, who was dragged to the ground on Sept. 9, said the mayor was “on the same page as us” on increasing police accountability.

keywords.value: Frascatore, James (New York, NY, Police Officer)
